content.p: The University of Nottingham Malaysia works with a number of international academic services, educational agencies and counsellors in countries across the globe. These agents and counsellors can help you find the right course, and offer support and advice through the application process. Staff at the University's International Office work closely with all our representatives, ensuring that they are able to give you the most up-to-date advice on everything from scholarships to visa applications and admission deadlines. Most of our overseas representatives have offices in a number of cities and countries. Check the list below to find an official University of Nottingham representative near you. If your country is not included in this list, you may contact the university directly at SR@nottingham.edu.my for enquiries. Bahrain Bangladesh Brunei Cambodia China Denmark Egypt G Gambia Hong Kong I India Indonesia Iran Japan Kazakhstan Kenya Kuwait Maldives Mauritius Myanmar Nepal Nigeria Oman Pakistan Qatar Rwanda Saudi Arabia South Korea Sri Lanka Sudan Tanzania Turkmenistan Uganda United Arab Emirates Vietnam Z Zambia Zimbabwe telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8778 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8005
